text: E jenumanja achimisyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito)! Pamasile pam'bichilile Ntenga Jwetu (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwaakunsalichisya palangulangu yaijinji mu yamwaliji nkusisa ya m’chitabu (cha Baibulo), soni ni akuileka yaijinji, pamasile palim'bichilile kuumila kwa Allah lilanguka (Muhammadi ﷺ) kwisa soni Chitabu chakusalichisya kusyesyene (Qur’an)
